name: test_successful_update_task
description: Create new task with generated data, updates it and validate if not equal to initial and equal to newly generated

steps.name: Create new task with body: {'name': 'plant59'}, expected status code: 200
Create url with base url and endpoint: /list/901510919856/task
Send POST request to https://api.clickup.com/api/v2/list/901510919856/task with {'name': 'plant59'}None, expected status code 200
Update task by ID 86c3f7wgq with new data {'name': 'tonight636'}, expected status code: 200
Create url with base url and endpoint: /task/86c3f7wgq
Send PUT request to https://api.clickup.com/api/v2/task/86c3f7wgq with {'name': 'tonight636'}None, expected status code 200
